definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

pinyin: he2 shi4 lu4 yin1 ci2 dai4

sentences.english: PSF: You prefer doing your work on your own in your studio?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己一个人在录音棚里捣鼓吗？

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通过听录音磁带，来帮助学生对文章的结构有所了解。

sentences.english: Questions in the Listening section are now also recorded.
sentences.chinese: 听力部分的问题同时以录音形式出现。

sentences.english: Many tapes don't have standard pronounciation.
sentences.chinese: 很多录音带上的发音不标准。

sentences.english: Listen again and follow the instructions next to the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 再听一遍录音，边听边读图画旁的说明。

sentences.english: Can you find a audio cassette player?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到一个盒带录音机吗？

sentences.english: At that moment I understood why Larry rushed to the recording mahcine every time he went back home.
sentences.chinese: 我这才明白为什么拉瑞每天回家直奔电话录音机。

sentences.english: In addition, it encrypts all the calls to ensure that no one can listen to your saved conversations.
sentences.chinese: 而且别人无法听到这些经过加密的通话录音。

sentences.english: You can keep my recorder for three days.
sentences.chinese: 我的录音机你可以假座三天。

sentences.english: These days I am practicing it with my casette tape recorder at home.
sentences.chinese: 这几天，我正在家里配合录音机练习。

sentences.english: If you are using a brush for painting , the kind of masking tape that you choose can be important.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是用油漆刷，那种录音带，您可以掩蔽重要。

sentences.english: The nature of the new wiretaps is also cause for concern.
sentences.chinese: 新的电话录音性质也令人关注。

sentences.english: When you are recording video, it will use the secondary mic for the sound.
sentences.chinese: 当你在录制视频时，他会使用第二个麦克风录音。

sentences.english: He took a job as a carpenter with the task of building a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 于是他承接了修建一个录音棚的木匠活。

sentences.english: They assumed the editing, sound recording and post-production series of work.
sentences.chinese: 他们分别承担了采编，录音以及后期制作等系列工作。

definition: speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message
to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
screenshot/to capture an image displayed on a computer screen
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
